content: {"name": "We Are Family", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Serves: Shaw, Columbia Heights, Petworth and Adams-Morgan Senior Residents only\n* To register to the program to: 202-487-8698 or email us at wearefamilydc@gmail.com\nIf you qualify, we will be glad to add you to the list for a regular monthly delivery of non-perishables and produce, or, if need be, provide an emergency delivery.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "", "address_2": null, "city": "Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20009", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.917405, "longitude": -77.028989}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 487-8698", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Seniors Only"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Meal delivery available for seniors"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Emergency food available on an as-needed basis."}]}
